scripts.check-iam: gcloud iam roles describe custom_storage_read_write --project=examen-cloud-function-raphael && gcloud storage buckets get-iam-policy gs://exercicee
scripts.check-result:
curl -s -o /dev/null -w 'HTTP Status: %{http_code}
' -X POST $(gcloud functions describe process-coordinates --format='value(httpsTrigger.url)') && (gcloud storage ls gs://exercicee/resultat.csv && echo '
✅ Verification passed') || echo '
❌ Verification failed'
